pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Date-convert-AD-BSA Lightweight package that allows to convert AD to BS and vice versa.## InstallationYou can install the package using pip:```pip install date-convert-ad-bsorpip3 install date-convert-ad-bs```## UsageTo use the package, simply import it and call its functions:```pythonfrom dateconvert import DateConvertconverter = DateConvert()print(converter.ad_to_bs(1993,5,29))print(converter.bs_to_ad(2050,2,11))```
